GET /radar/email/security/summary/arc.description: Retrieves the distribution of emails by ARC (Authenticated Received Chain) validation.

parameters.description: Array of names used to label the series in the response.
parameters.name: name

schema.description: Array of names used to label the series in the response.

parameters.description: Filters results by date range. For example, use `7d` and `7dcontrol` to compare this week with the previous week. Use this parameter or set specific start and end dates (`dateStart` and `dateEnd` parameters).
parameters.name: dateRange

schema.description: Filters results by date range. For example, use `7d` and `7dcontrol` to compare this week with the previous week. Use this parameter or set specific start and end dates (`dateStart` and `dateEnd` parameters).

parameters.description: Start of the date range.
parameters.name: dateStart

schema.description: Start of the date range.

parameters.description: End of the date range (inclusive).
parameters.name: dateEnd

schema.description: End of the date range (inclusive).

parameters.description: Filters results by DKIM (DomainKeys Identified Mail) validation status.
parameters.name: dkim

schema.description: Filters results by DKIM (DomainKeys Identified Mail) validation status.

parameters.description: Filters results by DMARC (Domain-based Message Authentication, Reporting and Conformance) validation status.
parameters.name: dmarc

schema.description: Filters results by DMARC (Domain-based Message Authentication, Reporting and Conformance) validation status.

parameters.description: Filters results by SPF (Sender Policy Framework) validation status.
parameters.name: spf

schema.description: Filters results by SPF (Sender Policy Framework) validation status.

parameters.description: Filters results by TLS version.
parameters.name: tlsVersion

schema.description: Filters results by TLS version.

parameters.description: Format in which results will be returned.
parameters.name: format

schema.description: Format in which results will be returned.

items.description: Annotation associated with the result (e.g. outage or other type of event).

isInstantaneous.description: Whether event is a single point in time or a time range.

level.description: Provides an indication of how much confidence Cloudflare has in the data.

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp of the last dataset update.

normalization.description: Normalization method applied to the results. Refer to [Normalization methods](https://developers.cloudflare.com/radar/concepts/normalization/).

parameters.name: dateStart

schema.description: Start of the date range.

parameters.description: End of the date range (inclusive).
parameters.name: dateEnd

schema.description: End of the date range (inclusive).

parameters.description: Filters results by ARC (Authenticated Received Chain) validation.
parameters.name: arc

schema.description: Filters results by ARC (Authenticated Received Chain) validation.

parameters.description: Filters results by DKIM (DomainKeys Identified Mail) validation status.
parameters.name: dkim

schema.description: Filters results by DKIM (DomainKeys Identified Mail) validation status.

parameters.description: Filters results by DMARC (Domain-based Message Authentication, Reporting and Conformance) validation status.
parameters.name: dmarc

schema.description: Filters results by DMARC (Domain-based Message Authentication, Reporting and Conformance) validation status.

parameters.description: Filters results by SPF (Sender Policy Framework) validation status.
parameters.name: spf

schema.description: Filters results by SPF (Sender Policy Framework) validation status.

parameters.description: Filters results by TLS version.
parameters.name: tlsVersion

schema.description: Filters results by TLS version.

parameters.description: Filters results by TLD category.
parameters.name: tldCategory

schema.description: Filters results by TLD category.

parameters.description: Format in which results will be returned.
parameters.name: format

schema.description: Format in which results will be returned.

items.description: Annotation associated with the result (e.g. outage or other type of event).

isInstantaneous.description: Whether event is a single point in time or a time range.

level.description: Provides an indication of how much confidence Cloudflare has in the data.

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp of the last dataset update.

normalization.description: Normalization method applied to the results. Refer to [Normalization methods](https://developers.cloudflare.com/radar/concepts/normalization/).

GET /radar/email/security/top/tlds/spoof.summary: Get top TLDs by email spoof classification
